basics.name: Le Phuc Tai
basics.label: Senior Software Engineer
basics.summary: I'm a senior software engineer with more than 5 years in Frontend development with React, Redux, and JavaScript. And hands-on Backend stuff such as Java, Spring, Hibernate, Docker

projects.name: Hut Reservation
projects.summary: Developed a single page web application with Java (using Jersey as REST api) and AngularJS. That helps guest, climbers, mountaineers, families reserve hut. Developing offline mode, synchronize data when network reconnect

work.summary: SecuTix is a Global provider of a Ticketing Engagement Platform that helps organizations boost ticket sales and enhance audiences’ experience before, during, and after events. Our customers are Opéra National de Paris, the UEFA, Centre Pompidou, Aspro Parks, Saracens, Paléo Festival, and more.
highlights:
Responsibilities:
- As a developer, I participate in a product team with Agile/Scrum development process.
- Do work breakdown structure for User Story, define impact, implement new features.
- Collaborate with the customer support team to analyze and fix issues in production.
- Do code review together in the team.
- Responsible for the quality and optimize performance with good data structure & algorithms for a Seat Map module that helps to visualize seat map with D3 & ExtJS (canvas, SVG, html5).
- Develop a large scale widget in a mono repo.

Technical stacks:
- Frontend: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Extjs, JQuery, D3, canvas, svg, react - redux, jest, enzyme, Webpack, Babel, Gulp, Storybook, NPM/Yarn, mono ui components, styled component.
- Backend: Java, Spring, Hibernate, Oracle, NoSQL (MongoDB).
- CI/CD: Jenkins.

projects.name: Seat map
highlights: A Frontend module, that helps operator draw and interact with seats which are visualized from a big stadium. Some big seat map with more than 80 000 seats, that means we have to find a way to deal with a big DOM element in application but have to keep good performance for the operator.
Developing as a widget so that can reuse in other places in the application (sales configuration, sale seat map in Box Office module, etc).

projects.name: Gravity
highlights: Develop widgets (providing as an iframe) for customers so that they can put on their website. An innovative topic, working directly with colleagues in Switzerland.
Implement REST API to provide data for Frontend. Build UI component, widget for final purpose is reused and plugged in customer's website.

work.summary:
TymeGlobal is building a multi-country Digital Bank focused on emerging markets in Asia and Africa. We design, build, and operate digital banking ecosystems.
Responsibilities:
highlights: Coordinate with team members (PO/BA/QA/SA) to clarify the requirements.
Implement new features and release them with a plan on production.
Do detail design and code review

projects.name: MoreTyme - Buy now, Pay later
projects.summary: MoreTyme is a Buy Now, Pay Later service for TymeBank customers. You pay half the item’s purchase price at the till point and take it home straight away. Then pay the rest in 2 equal payments over 2 months.
highlights: Clarify, design and develop microservices to integrate with Electrum, Pick n Pay
Develop scheduled job to generate billing and send to customer
Write scalable serverless application with AWS (s3, msk, lambda etc)

projects.name: Business Banking
highlights: Responsible for development and quality of internet banking. The single page web application.
Build reusable code for UI components and document with Storybook.
Integrate with Core Banking and many third parties (Mambu, Smart Shopper | Pick n Pay, SmartVista, RCS - credit card, Electrum)
Develop new features such as SendMany (send money to many people with just one click), Bulk Payment (can be used for paying monthly salary) and Credit Card

education.institution: Ho Chi Minh University of Science
